p: The initial oven temperature was 55 °C, then increased to 100 °C at a rate of 1 °C/min, successively to 250 °C at a rate of 5 °C/min and finally constant at 250 °C for 15 min. The analysis was carried out by introducing 1 μL of a solution consisting of 10 μL of pure essential oil dissolved in 1mL of methylene chloride in the gas chromatograph injector. The acquisition time was 90 min.
